author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Huifa Foodstuff says dividend payment date on April 26
text:
April 20(Reuters) - Shandong Huifa Foodstuff Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.25 yuan (before tax) per share and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 0.4 new shares for every share for FY 2017, to shareholders of record on April 25
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 26 and the dividend will be paid on April 26
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/G4trGy
